HTMLVideoElementVideoWidth.summary:
The interface's read-only videoWidth property indicates the intrinsic width of the video, expressed in CSS pixels.
In simple terms, this is the width of the media in its natural size.

remarks.para: See HTMLVideoElement.videoHeight > About intrinsic width and height for more details.

HTMLVideoElementVideoWidth.value:
An integer value specifying the intrinsic width of the video in CSS pixels.
If the element's is HTMLMediaElement.HAVE_NOTHING, then the value of this property is 0, because neither video nor poster frame size information is yet available.
